parameter.name: accountId
parameter.description: The accountId of the account that the user is using, returned in the Login response.

parameter.name: envelopeId
parameter.description: The envelopeId Guid of the envelope being accessed.

parameter.name: recipientUserName
parameter.description: Specifies the username of the recipient. You can use either email and userName or userId to identify the recipient.

parameter.name: authenticationMethod
parameter.description: This is used to authenticate the recipient/signer.

parameter.name: clientUserId
parameter.description: A sender created value. If provided, the recipient is treated as an embedded (captive) recipient or signer.

parameter.name: email
parameter.description: Specifies the email of the recipient.

parameter.name: returnUrl
parameter.description: The url the recipient is redirected to after the signing session has ended.

parameter.name: pingFrequency
parameter.description: This is the interval, in seconds, between pings on the pingUr, Only used if pingUrl is specified.

parameter.name: authenticationInstant
parameter.description: A sender generated value that indicates the date/time that the signer was authenticated.

parameter.name: recipientId
parameter.description: This is unique ID for the recipient.

parameter.name: assertionId
parameter.description: A unique identifier of the authentication event executed by the client application.

parameter.name: securityDomain
parameter.description: The domain in which the user authenticated.

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: Specifies the user ID of the recipient. You can use with user ID or email and user name to identify the recipient.

parameter.name: pingUrl
parameter.description: A client Url to be pinged by the DocuSign Signing experience to indicate to the client that Signing is active.
